info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 1:29PM EDT until July 27 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Albany County in east central New York... Central Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 129 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Loudonville, or over Latham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Latham, Menands, Green Island, Grafton, Waterford, Berlin, Loudonville, West Sand Lake, Center Brunswick, Wyantskill, Averill Park, Wynantskill, North Greenbush and Brunswick. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
